description:
The gopass-jsonapi is in particular useful for browser plugins like [gopassbridge](https://github.com/gopasspw/gopassbridge).

## Package Parameters

- `/Configure:false`
  - Gopass must be configured beforehand
  - Configure gopass-jsonapi for all users
  - Defaults to `false`
- `/Browser:chrome`
  - Defines the [browser](https://github.com/gopasspw/gopass-jsonapi#supported-browsers) for the gopass-jsonapi
  - Defaults to `chrome`
  - Skipped if Configure is set to `false`
author: dominikschulz
